full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL @005A *, ,PO BZLOG BSGYUR, RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA'I 'DI NI KHA GCIG GNYIS, 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZOR DE LA CHOS KYI RGYAL PO BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES MING BTAGS NA TSOGS MI MTHUN PA'I GCIG BYAS PA MED PO YOD PA DANG, CHOS KYI RGYAL PO BZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYEN BSNYEN PA DANG, SNGA MO NAS NGO MTSAR CAN BKA' BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG SMON PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG GI RIM GRO DGOS PA CHE, ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO LA CHO GA BAR, RANG DANG BSKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA PHAN PA DANG MI SRID PA'I SNYAMS PAS, SLOB NYER LA BYAS PA'I SLOB DPON SNYING KHAMS, CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYI BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS 'BRIS PA BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO'I DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
